message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. It's the best offer you'll get!
My turn! How about a 55-45 split?  It's a better deal for both of us in the long run. Think about it!
I'm willing to compromise. 58-42 is a fair split, considering the inflation. Don't wait, it'll only get worse!
Okay, Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50-50 split is the fairest and most logical solution.  Every round costs us money!
